Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to invalidate history, for example when there is a scene cut in your game.

# shouldResetHistory

**Instance Property**

A Boolean property indicating whether to reset history.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldResetHistory: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to invalidate history, for example when there is a scene cut in your game.
title: shouldResetHistory
